1.details: Review specification and determine integration approach with existing ISSB Portal infrastructure. Focus on database schema design, component architecture, and seamless integration with existing volunteer management system.

2.content: Design Database Schema for Announcements System
2.details: Create announcements table with proper relationships to existing profiles table. Include fields for title, content, recipient groups, publication status, email notification flags, and timestamps. Design email tracking table for optional email functionality.

3.details: Create edge functions for: list-announcements (public), create-announcement (admin only), update-announcement (admin only), delete-announcement (admin only), and send-announcement-emails (optional email notifications). Implement proper role-based access control.

4.details: Create announcements page with announcement list and individual announcement cards. Integrate with existing member dashboard by adding 'Announcements' tab. Use TanStack Query for data fetching and Shadcn/ui components for consistent design.

5.details: Build admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting announcements. Include form with rich text editor, recipient group selection, publication toggle, and email notification options. Integrate with existing admin pages structure.

6.details: Create Supabase Edge Function for sending announcement emails to selected recipient groups. Build email templates and integrate with existing authentication system. Ensure opt-out functionality and deliverability monitoring.

7.details: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA standards including semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, color contrast compliance, form labels, and screen reader compatibility. Test with assistive technologies.

8.details: Deploy backend functions to Supabase, build and deploy frontend changes, create test announcements, and verify all functionality works correctly. Ensure backward compatibility with existing volunteer system.
